features: 4.2-fluid ounce tube of Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash Daily Face Scrub with 2% salicylic acid acne medication to help clean and exfoliate deep into the pores to sweep away dirt, oil & pore-clogging dead skin cells
Acne-fighting exfoliating face wash contains MicroClear Technology, a powerful technology scientifically shown to boost delivery of salicylic acid acne medication to the source of breakouts

Our daily face scrub for acne-prone skin contains exfoliators that dissolve oil, dirt, & impurities to help unclog pores and leave skin clear and smooth, and is formulated with 2% salicylic acid acne medication
From the #1 dermatologist-recommended acne brand, the exfoliating oil-free face wash is gentle enough for daily use as part of a regular acne-prone skin care routine
Help fight acne and prevent breakouts with Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash Daily Face Scrub.
body.description: Clean deep into pores and help stop breakouts before they start with Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash Daily Face Scrub with 2% salicylic acid acne medication. This unique multi-action acne fighting formula contains MicroClear, a powerful technology scientifically shown to boost the delivery of salicylic acid acne medication, straight to the source of breakouts. With MicroClear Technology and exfoliators, this acne face exfoliating wash works to cut through oil, helping to unclog pores and leave skin clear and smooth. This daily facial scrub is gentle enough for everyday use. From a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand, our medicated daily acne face scrub can be added to a daily skincare routine to help eliminate breakouts for clean, clearer-looking skin.

productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: Benefits: Our breakthrough exfoliating scrub features MicroClear, a powerful technology scientifically shown to boost the delivery of acne medicine to the source of breakouts and speed treatment deep to the source. The MicroClear Technology and gentle exfoliators work together to cut through oil and dissolve dirt and impurities, so your skin is left clear and smooth. See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Oil-Free Acne Wash Daily Face Scrub Clean deep into pores and help stop breakouts before they start with Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash Daily Face Scrub. This unique multi-action acne-fighting formula contains MicroClear, a powerful technology scientifically shown to boost the delivery of salicylic acid, straight to the source of breakouts.

SALICYLIC ACID Made with salicylic acid acne medication. EXFOLIATORS UNCLOG PORES Our daily face scrub contains exfoliators that dissolve oil, dirt, & impurities to help unclog pores and leave skin clear and smooth. DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED BRAND DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED BRAND Formulated from the #1 Dermatologist Recommended Acne Brand.

HEALTHY-LOOKING SKIN ROUTINE CLEANSE After removing your makeup, use Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash Daily Face Scrub to cleanse your skin of dirt & oil that builds up over time. TREAT After you cleanse your skin, target your breakouts with acne spot treatments. MOISTURIZE Finally, make sure you apply your favorite moisturizer to help hydrate your skin. SPF If you're prepping for the day, don't forget to apply sunscreen! We recommend using a minimum of SPF 30 to protect your skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My "go to" daily face scrub
reviews.reviewText: There are obviously lots of face scrubs out there to choose from. I have definitely tried much of the competition over the years and i always go back to the Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Face Scrub for my daily face scrub. Like most people, its all about how the skin feels after you are finished, but I also like a scrub that both allows a lather to build and the slight grit does well for me. I actually have this one on my reoccurring Subscribe and Save List.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels soooo good
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased to report that this face wash leaves my face feeling wonderful. I use it once every two days or so and my skin is glowing! Would totally purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best face cleaner imo
reviews.reviewText: This has been the best face cleaner for me, the texture is just right for scrubbing, it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as good as the Blackhead Eliminating scrub, but the best Neutrogena alternative
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty good scrub. It's not great, but it works. It doesn't seem to be too harsh. It obviously has some kind of menthol/cooling ingredient in it because it gives you that kind of feeling when you use it. I'm still hoping Neutrogena brings back the Blackhead Eliminating Scrub as that was incredbily good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought Cerave at Walmart & it was causing my skin to break out. This works great & isn't as expensive. It's not a gel like Cerave was. It's more of a scrub. Thanks so much. Will buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: High salicylic acid content. Works great. No overbearing odors and usually doesn’t dry out my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Face feels soft but the smell isn’t great.
reviews.reviewText: I miss the old neutragena facial scrub. It was a refreshing eye opening smell- like sunshine in the morning. This one works well but it smells like formaldehyde. I won’t buy it again.

Me gusta porque no es agresivo ni tan grumoso como otros exfoliantes. Me gusta porque es gentil y de verdad que funciona al limpiar impurezas de la piel, en especial en zona T. Y para su precio, es buen producto! Lo recomiendo en piel sensibles y grasa o mixta!
Soy piel grasa con imperfecciones... Me ayuda mucho con la textura y no irrita mi piel...deja una sensación fresca
Me gusto te deja la cara limpia aunque despues de que te la lavas a las hra te deja como la cara con exceso de brillo y es algo molesto, de lo demas bien
Me encantó este producto, es ideal para pieles grasas ya que contiene ácido salicílico, su uso debe de ser de 1 a 2 veces a la semana, deja la piel sin rugosidades y muy limpia.
